emails.subject: Re: OAuth Verification Request for Project Beams-Infra-Staging (id: beams-infra-staging)
emails.snippet: Dear Google OAuth team, I am sharing two demo videos that show the OAuth consent screen workflow: If Google Account is already connected and calendar access given. Also giving access to email: video
emails.body:
Dear Google OAuth team,

I am sharing two demo videos that show the OAuth consent screen workflow:

   1. If Google Account is already connected and calendar access given.
   Also giving access to email: video here
   <https://www.loom.com/share/930bf335428843b1bb0b5c62e438ec9c?sid=6e16aa57-e473-4bad-bfe9-6226364705ae>
   2. If no account is connected, I connect the Google Account incl. both
   calendar and email: video here
   <https://www.loom.com/share/aafdac5f050548d08ef2ed7444da0550?sid=a756e426-ffa8-4e06-8ecd-30ddbdef78a4>

Please let us know if you need anything else from our side.

Thank you and all the best,
Jana

*--*
*Jana Schellong*
Co-Founder @usebeams.com
+49 176 93183175

*ðŸŽ‰ beams was featured in TechCrunch
<https://techcrunch.com/2023/10/02/beams-helps-product-teams-shine-a-light-on-the-work-that-matters-most/amp/>
ðŸŽ‰*

On Wed, Mar 27, 2024 at 11:39â€¯PM API OAuth Dev Verification <
api-oauth-dev-verification-reply+0mkvoso0guwhq1d@google.com> wrote:

> Hello Google Developer,
>
> Thank you for your patience while we reviewed your submission for project
> *beams-infra-staging*. We need you to address the following items for us
> to continue your appâ€™s verification:
>
>    - Your demo video does not show the OAuth consent screen workflow.
>
> *Please take the following action(s) to continue with your request*
>
> â¤· Reply to this email with the following information:
>
>    - A link to a demo video showing the OAuth workflow (Learn more
>    <https://support.google.com/cloud/answer/13804565?hl=en&ref_topic=13841839&sjid=3852194599686420982-NA#zippy=%2Cyour-demo-video-does-not-show-the-oauth-consent-screen-workflow>
>    )
>
> *Important!* Once you have addressed the issues above, reply directly to
> this email to confirm. You must reply to this email after fixing the
> highlighted issues to continue with the app verification process.
>
> *Need to make changes to your verification request?*
>
> Please make direct changes on the Cloud Console
> <https://console.developers.google.com/>. Save and submit the changes
> when finished.
>
> *No longer need access to these scopes?*
>
> Please reply to this email to cancel the verification request.
>
> *Need other help?*
>
> For more information on OAuth Verification, you can read the terms or
> policies for the APIs or products your app uses, as well as the following
> resources:
>
>    - *Link to OAuth Verification FAQ*
>    <https://support.google.com/cloud/answer/9110914#%20target=>
>
>
>
> Thank you,
>
> The Third Party Data Safety Team
>

Yes, 4/9 at 2pm works well for us. Feel free to send a calendar invite.

We are looking forward to it! Best,
Mihri and Jana

>>>>>>>>>> technical founders and she and I overlapped at Facebook when Parse got
>>>>>>>>>> acquired there. We even worked in the same building!

>>>>>>>>>> system-level productivity and AI-powered workflow platform for
>>>>>>>>>> high-performing teams.
>>>>>>>>>>
>>>>>>>>>> What started as a productivity app for tech employees is becoming
>>>>>>>>>> an integrated, data-driven work platform that understands behavior, detects
>>>>>>>>>> patterns and automates workflows for teams.
>>>>>>>>>>
>>>>>>>>>> 73% DAU/WAU, 65% retention (10-week), #1 product on Product Hunt
>>>>>>>>>> <https://www.producthunt.com/products/beams-3>, featured in
>>>>>>>>>> TechCrunch
>>>>>>>>>> <https://techcrunch.com/2023/10/02/beams-helps-product-teams-shine-a-light-on-the-work-that-matters-most/>
>>>>>>>>>>
>>>>>>>>>> Raised $1 million from Octopus Ventures and notable angels like
>>>>>>>>>> Scott Chacon (GitHub co-founder), Ashley Smith (former CMO at
>>>>>>>>>> Gitlab/Twilio) and Phil Chambers (Peakon co-founder acq. by Workday)
>>>>>>>>>>
>>>>>>>>>
>

emails.subject: Re: Excited to meet soon!
emails.snippet: Hi Joanne, We'd love to meet you again and discuss our solution in more detail. Maybe some time next week? Let us know what works best for you. All the best, Mihri and Jana On Tue, Mar 19, 2024 at
emails.body:
Hi Joanne,

We'd love to meet you again and discuss our solution in more detail. Maybe
some time next week? Let us know what works best for you.

All the best,
Mihri and Jana

On Tue, Mar 19, 2024 at 6:04â€¯PM Jana Schellong <jana@usebeams.com> wrote:

> Hi Joanne,
>
> It was so nice meeting you today. Thanks for a great conversation.
>
> As discussed, here's the link to our deck
> <https://docsend.com/view/h7ig45zu7qzzmtrf>.
>
> We are looking forward to receiving your feedback, as well as the list of
> other potential investors you have in mind for us.
>
> Also, do let us know about the event at your office in May.
>
> All the best,
> Mihri and Jana
>
> On Tue, Mar 19, 2024 at 12:18â€¯PM Jana Schellong <jana@usebeams.com> wrote:
>
>> No worries, Joanne. See you at 12.45 at Philz.
>>
>>
>> On Tue 19. Mar 2024 at 12:07, Joanne Chen <JChen@foundationcap.com>
>> wrote:

>>>

>>>
>>>

>>>
>>>
>>>
>>> Joanne
>>>
>>

emails.subject: Re: Your beams internship application
emails.snippet: Hi Cedric, Thanks again for your time last week, it was super nice getting to know you. You mentioned that you might not be able to spend the full internship in Berlin. We would like to offer you the
emails.body:
Hi Cedric,

Thanks again for your time last week, it was super nice getting to know
you. You mentioned that you might not be able to spend the full internship
in Berlin. We would like to offer you the internship under the condition
that you spend at least 8 weeks with us in person. Do you think you'll be
able to do that?

We can happily intro you to our UChicago interns from last year, so that
you can understand a bit better what living costs to expect. Let us know if
you'd be interested in that.

All the best,
Mihri and Jana



On Tue, Mar 26, 2024 at 3:41â€¯PM Jana Schellong <jana@usebeams.com> wrote:

> Hi Cedric,
>
> This is Mihri and Jana, the co-founders of beams. Thanks so much for
> applying to our internship position via the UChicago Metcalf program. Your
> profile looks really impressive and we'd love to get to know you better.
>
> Before we schedule an interview slot, please note the following points:
>
>    1. We can only accommodate internships of minimum 10 weeks duration,
>    between June and September 2024.
>    2. We prefer it to be in person in Berlin, Germany. But we would be
>    willing to consider a remote option, if you can guarantee a minimum of 4
>    hours time overlap with our Berlin working hours.
>    3. We are unfortunately unable to provide a visa, so you need to
>    ensure yourself (with the help of your ChicagoU international careers
>    advisor) that you can spend the time in Germany.
>
> If all of the above apply to you, then please reply to this email
> indicating your preferred time period for the internship and *book an
> interview slot either on Thursday or Friday this week (March 28th or 29th)*
> via this link <https://calendly.com/jana-beams/30min>.
>
> And please let us know if you have any questions :)
>
> All the best,
> Mihri & Jana
>
> *--*
> *Jana Schellong*
> Co-Founder @usebeams.com
> +49 176 93183175
>
> *ðŸŽ‰ beams was featured in TechCrunch
> <https://techcrunch.com/2023/10/02/beams-helps-product-teams-shine-a-light-on-the-work-that-matters-most/amp/> ðŸŽ‰*
>
